source_description: --feature-description Modernize the welcome page UI and shared layout/components to match the provided clean, card-based aesthetic for demo use, while keeping DaisyUI/Tailwind. --intent-summary Deliver a polished, light UI on the welcome page and shared layout/components for a demo hostel with 8 rooms and 5 bookings; focus on visual design (spacing, cards, buttons) without altering core data flows.
